statements: SELECT * FROM monitoring_tools;
SELECT tool_name, tool_description FROM monitoring_tools;
SELECT tool_description, tool_name FROM monitoring_tools;
SELECT tool_id, tool_name, last_update FROM monitoring_tools WHERE tool_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM monitoring_tools ORDER BY last_update DESC;
SELECT * FROM monitoring_tools WHERE tool_id = 1
SELECT tool_name, tool_description FROM monitoring_tools WHERE tool_id > 5 ORDER BY last_update DESC
SELECT tool_id, tool_name, tool_description FROM monitoring_tools WHERE tool_name LIKE 'Tool%' AND last_update >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00'
SELECT tool_id, tool_name FROM monitoring_tools WHERE tool_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY tool_name ASC
SELECT tool_id, tool_name, last_update FROM monitoring_tools WHERE last_update BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-12-31 23:59:59'
SELECT * FROM security_vulnerabilities;
SELECT vulnerability_name, description FROM security_vulnerabilities ORDER BY vulnerability_name DESC;
SELECT tool_name, vendor_name, license_key FROM monitoring_tools WHERE vendor_name = 'Microsoft';
SELECT id, vulnerability_name, detection_timestamp FROM security_vulnerabilities WHERE id = 3;
SELECT tool_name, license_key FROM monitoring_tools ORDER BY license_key ASC;
SELECT * FROM security_vulnerabilities WHERE id = 1;
SELECT vulnerability_name, description FROM security_vulnerabilities WHERE id > 3 ORDER BY detection_timestamp DESC;
SELECT tool_name, vendor_name FROM monitoring_tools WHERE tool_name LIKE 'A%' AND vendor_name NOT LIKE '%Microsoft%' ORDER BY vendor_name, tool_name;
SELECT vulnerability_name, description FROM security_vulnerabilities UNION ALL SELECT tool_name, vendor_name FROM monitoring_tools;
SELECT vulnerability_name, description FROM security_vulnerabilities WHERE id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT * FROM security_alerts;
SELECT alert_id, alert_type FROM security_alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Critical';
SELECT tool_name, tool_version FROM integration_tools WHERE tool_version LIKE '%2.0%';
SELECT scan_id, scan_date FROM vulnerability_scans ORDER BY scan_date DESC;
SELECT tool_name, tool_description FROM integration_tools WHERE tool_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM security_alerts WHERE alert_id > 1000 ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC;
SELECT alert_message, alert_type FROM security_alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Critical' ORDER BY alert_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM vulnerability_scans WHERE scan_date >= '2021-01-01' AND scan_status = 'Failed';
SELECT tool_name, tool_version FROM integration_tools WHERE tool_description LIKE '%automation%';

SELECT scan_id, scan_date, scan_results->'$.vulnerabilities' AS vulnerabilities_count FROM vulnerability_scans WHERE JSON_LENGTH(scan_results->'$.vulnerabilities') > 5 ORDER BY vulnerabilities_count DESC, scan_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM tools;
SELECT id, name, version FROM tools ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT description, name FROM tools WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM vulnerabilities WHERE alert_status = TRUE;
SELECT monitored_id, timestamp, message FROM detection_logs ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM tools WHERE version > 1.0;
SELECT id, name FROM tools WHERE name LIKE 'T%';
SELECT t.name, m.status FROM tools t JOIN monitoring m ON t.id = m.tool_id;
SELECT v.description, v.severity, d.timestamp FROM vulnerabilities v JOIN detection_logs d ON v.id = d.monitored_id;
SELECT t.name, COUNT(*) AS total_monitored FROM tools t JOIN monitoring m ON t.id = m.tool_id GROUP BY t.name ORDER BY total_monitored DESC;
SELECT * FROM tools;
SELECT tool_name, tool_description FROM tools ORDER BY tool_name ASC;
SELECT tool_name, tool_description FROM tools WHERE tool_id = 2;
SELECT monitoring_tool, monitoring_interval FROM monitoring WHERE monitoring_interval > 30;
SELECT alert_message, alert_time FROM alerts WHERE alert_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM tools;
SELECT tool_name, tool_description FROM tools WHERE tool_id = 1;
SELECT vulnerability_description FROM vulnerabilities WHERE severity = 'High';
SELECT tool_name, monitoring_tool, monitoring_interval FROM tools, monitoring WHERE tools.tool_id = monitoring.tool_id;

SELECT tool_name, detection_time, alert_message FROM tools, detection, alerts WHERE tools.tool_id = monitoring.tool_id AND detection.monitoring_id = monitoring.monitoring_id AND detection.detection_id = alerts.detection_id ORDER BY detection_time DESC;
